description:
Made from a blend of wool and polyester, the 60g insulation is also made from 100% recycled material. The shirt is enhanced with reinforced forearms to ensure longevity.

Snaps on the cuffs allow you to adjust them as needed and a hidden accessory loop in one of the two chest pockets allows you to hang anything. With two handwarmer pockets at the waist and an inside pocket, the Canadian shirt has a practical side while maintaining its style.

Whether it's to support you in your wood chores or to look good at the sugar shack, it's definitely a piece that can follow you for a lifetime! Discover our new colors.
name: Hooke Canadian Insulated Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 80% recycled polyester, 20% recycled wool heavyweight flannel
